text: I just pushed two updates to the live galapagos cms
the "add smart quotes" button appears on text boxes of blogs and works when the box is active.
it will obviously convert all the single and double quotes to smart ones - but it also converts a double dash into an em dash
if there are other punctionational things that we wont for consistency sake - like three periods converted to an ellipses, let me know.

additionally <@U02618EV1> and <@U026PLK4S> I pushed a change to the image resizing on uploads so that the blog "hero" images do not center crop anymore.  please give it a shot and let me know how it works out
awesome! i gotta head to a client meeting, but will when i get back. Thanks Scott!
Just checked it out. Works perfectly. Thank you
Also, not urgent, I think I liked the sidebar "active" color better when it was black as opposed to orange...
